function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Historical pandemic diseases have been influenced by the built environment, with measures such as quarantine, infrastructure improvements, and urban planning playing a role in disease management.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of infectious diseases in built environments","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contaminated water supply leading to disease outbreak","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor sanitation and sewage management leading to disease transmission","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sunlight and ventilation in buildings contributing to the spread of tuberculosis","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor city planning and sanitation leading to rapid spread of plague and cholera","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of gastrointestinal problems and fevers associated with infectious diseases such as dysentery or typhoid among the legions or in military camps.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Outbreaks of the bubonic plague devastating europe in the mid-fourteenth century, causing the death of millions of people.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of the bubonic plague through trade routes, mainly via fleas carried by rats and other infected animals.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limitations and deficiencies of buildings in urban areas","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential temporary changes to the built environment","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of sustainability in the built environment","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential contamination by covid-19 and other fresh outbreaks of the virus","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deficiencies of buildings and the built environment revealed during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Queues before and after inoculation phase could lead to potential overcrowding and spread of contagious diseases in the waiting area.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mean and maximum values of the queue indicate higher patient congestion after inoculation, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Constant wait time of 15 minutes for post-inoculation waiting may result in patients being in close proximity for an extended period, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High patient density in queue","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High resource utilization","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High interarrival time leading to fewer patients vaccinated","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exceeding layout boundaries","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overutilization of resources in anamnesis, inoculation, and registration","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High variability in time between arrivals","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unbalanced integration of different types of resources","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overcrowding and bottleneck due to excessive number of doctors","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High probability of individuals having a body temperature lower than 37.5 \t c","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited space for mass vaccination clinic","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate anamnesis and rejection probability","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Elderly people taking more time for forms fill-in and vaccine inoculation","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Probability differences between adults and elderly people","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Time measurements and distributions for vaccination process parameters","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of physical system data in virtual system","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through physical system data handling","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation of physical system data","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Replicating solutions in the physical system without proper testing","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Automation failure in data collection leading to inaccurate time values","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate mapping of the real process due to incomplete or unreliable data","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resource overutilization leading to employee burnout and dissatisfaction","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Patient arrival inside the system may introduce contagious individuals into the environment.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Queue and waiting areas may facilitate close contact between individuals, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inoculation and treatment phases may lead to potential exposure to contaminated materials or infected individuals.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate vaccination process flowchart","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient representation of resources in the simulation model","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for dynamic factors in the simulation model","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to the entry of infected individuals into the clinic","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of undetected contagious individuals entering the vaccination process","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of disease during the waiting period post-inoculation","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Static data collection in simulation model","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of multiple queues in simulation model","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of dynamic real-time adaptation in simulation models","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"}]}
